description:
Adversaries may establish persistence and/or elevate privileges by executing malicious content triggered by application shims.
The Microsoft Windows Application Compatibility Infrastructure/Framework (Application Shim) was created to allow for backward compatibility of software as the operating system codebase changes over time
author: frack113
name: Potential Persistence Via Shim Database Modification
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\AppCompatFlags\\InstalledSDB\\* OR HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\AppCompatFlags\\Custom\\*) AND winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue") AND (NOT winlog.event_data.Details:""))
